com.artemis.managers

Class TagManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.Manager
      • com.artemis.managers.TagManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityObserver

    public class TagManager
extends Manager
    If you need to tag any entity, use this.

    A typical usage would be to tag entities such as "PLAYER", "BOSS" or something that is very unique.

    Author:
    Arni Arent

        public void register(java.lang.String tag,

        Tag an entity.

        Each tag can only be given to one entity at a time.

        e - the entity to get tagged
